definition: (after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this
a vegan/person following a vegan diet

sentences.english: Are vegans really at greater risk of B12 deficiency?
sentences.chinese: 純素食者患維生素B12缺乏症的風險真的很高嗎？

sentences.english: Yes, Mike Tyson, a man who once chewed on human ear, is now vegan.
sentences.chinese: 是的，曾經咬人耳朵的拳手泰森現在是一個素食者了。

sentences.english: Because of this, there have been claims that vegetarians are more at risk of iron-deficiency anaemia than non-vegetarians.
sentences.chinese: 因此，素食者比非素食都更容易患缺鐵性貧血。

sentences.english: This religious group has considerably more vegetarians than the general population.
sentences.chinese: 這個宗教集團比普通羣體有相當更多的素食者。

sentences.english: Vegans - and anyone else - should be able to obtain B12 by consuming organically grown produce.
sentences.chinese: 純素食者和其他人都應該能從有機食品中獲得B12。

sentences.english: And a daily vitamin D supplement is a good idea for vegans and meat-eaters alike.
sentences.chinese: 每天補充維生素D對於素食者和肉食者都是很好的。

sentences.english: However, these differences were not reflected in their annual income, which was similar to that of non-vegetarians.
sentences.chinese: 但素食者和非素食者在收入方面沒有什麼差別。

sentences.english: However, these differences were not reflected in their annual income, which was similar to that of non-vegetarians.
sentences.chinese: 但素食者和非素食者在收入方面沒有什麼差別。

sentences.english: Vv:Victor the vampire is a vegetarian.
sentences.chinese: 吸血鬼維克多是一個素食者。

sentences.english: What are some essential foods vegetarians should keep in the kitchen?
sentences.chinese: 什麼食物對素食者來說在廚房中是必備的呢？

sentences.english: Vegetarians believe that eating meat is bad karma .
sentences.chinese: 素食者認爲喫肉食是造惡業。

sentences.english: Ning said she did not think about this much when she became a vegetarian at first.
sentences.chinese: 寧說，之初成爲素食者並沒有想得那麼多。

sentences.english: Flesh-eaters' and vegetarians' views differ from each other sharply.
sentences.chinese: 肉食者和素食者的觀點截然不同。

sentences.english: You've gotto remember why you're doing what you're doing.
sentences.chinese: 你要記住你爲什麼成爲素食者。

sentences.english: When Newkirk learned Wynn had become a vegan, she didn't think the news was crazy.
sentences.chinese: 當紐克知道永利變成素食者，她並不覺得這有多瘋狂。

sentences.english: Some vegans eat a lot of junk, and their health suffers for it.
sentences.chinese: 有些嚴格素食者食用大量的垃圾食品，健康因此受損。

definition: a vegan/person following a vegan diet
veganism, a diet consisting solely of plant products/strict vegetarianism
